title: Kätzen Knights
description: The cat knight collecting gatcha game "Kätzen Knights" from yesterday's comic is not a real video game. I am sorry.
excerpt: Videogaming-related online strip by Mike Krahulik and Jerry Holkins. Includes news and commentary.
text: June 17, 2025 The cat knight collecting gatcha game "Kätzen Knights" from yesterday's comic is not a real video game. I am sorry.  We were just making fun of how ridiculous gatcha games are and how stupid the daily chores always sound. With that said, if you are a major gatcha game publisher and you’d like to make Kätzen Knights please don’t hesitate to reach out to us.  -Gabe out
html:
June 17, 2025

The cat knight collecting gatcha game "Kätzen Knights" from yesterday's comic is not a real video game. I am sorry. 

We were just making fun of how ridiculous gatcha games are and how stupid the daily chores always sound. With that said, if you are a major gatcha game publisher and you’d like to make Kätzen Knights please don’t hesitate to reach out to us. 


-Gabe out
